enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The state of the event input was negated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The state of the event input was asserted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b000
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is disabled; FSM = idle

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is enabled and waiting for the programmed event to occur; FSM = wfevt

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: The programmed event has occurred and the channel is asserting its output; FSM = assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b100
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is programmed for one-shot operation and the event has completed; FSM = os_hold

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is waiting for the selected input signals to be negated before rearming; FSM = wfclr

enumeratedValue.name: 0b111
enumeratedValue.description: The event output has been acknowledged; done signals are broadcast during 1-cycle state; FSM = done

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The state of the event input was negated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is defined as a DMA request output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is defined as a hardware trigger output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: The channel is defined as an interrupt request output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The channel event output is enabled to occur multiple times

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The channel event output is enabled to occur one time

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The event done indicators are broadcast to the appropriate selected event inputs

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The event done indicators are not broadcast to the appropriate selected event inputs

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The iEvent configuration registers for this channel can be read and written

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The iEvent configuration registers for this channel can only be read

register.name: BFECR0
register.description: iEvent Boolean Function Eva1ation Configuration Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Force the D input in this product term to a logical zero

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Pass the D input in this product term

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Complement the D input in this product term

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Force the D input in this product term to a logical one

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Force the C input in this product term to a logical one

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Complement the B input in this product term

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Force the B input in this product term to a logical one

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
